textAfterTable: About Chartered Logistics Ltd. Chartered Logistics Ltd., incorporated in the year 1995, is a Small Cap company (having a market cap of Rs 120.3 Cr.) operating in Service sector. Chartered Logistics Ltd. key Products/Revenue Segments include Service (Freight & Hire Charter) which contributed Rs 161.02 Cr to Sales Value (100.00% of Total Sales), for the year ending 31-Mar-2014. For the quarter ended 31-Mar-2015, the company has reported a Standalone sales of Rs. 71.99 Cr., up 121.44% from last quarter Sales of Rs. 32.51 Cr. and up 108.71% from last year same quarter Sales of Rs. 34.49 Cr. Company has reported net profit after tax of Rs. -0.83 Cr. in latest quarter. The company’s management includes Mr.Lalit Kumar Gandhi, Mr.Sandeep Shah, Ms.Anamika Jajoo, Ms.Nirzari Shah, Ms.Nisha Makwana, Ms.Anamika Jajoo, Ms.Nisha Makwana, Mr.Harsh Gandhi. Company has Vidya & Co. as its auditors. As on 30-Jun-2015, the company has a total of 99,340,000 shares outstanding.
